author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Captain Cummins leads the way as Australia wins 2nd test against Pakistan by 79 runs | Sports-Games
text:
Summary by Ground News Australia have a decent lead on day four of the Boxing Day Test against Pakistan at the MCG. The tourists have a 100-run lead at the end of the day's play. Australia have won the first two days of the Test, but Pakistan have not scored a wicket. Share menu More
Filters 10 Articles 10 Articles All Left Center Right
The Guardian Lean Left Mixed Factuality Independent: Scott Trust Limited Australia v Pakistan: Boxing Day Test, day four – live Cummins and Marsh lead fightback to 187-6 on day threePlay in Melbourne starts at 10am AEDT / 11pm GMTAny thoughts? Email or Tweet @Jimbo_CricketHello and welcome to the day four OBO of Australia v Pakistan from the MCG. Yesterday was a fantastically absorbing day of Test match cricket, Pakistan landing emphatic early blows with the new ball in Australia’s second innings to leave them 16-4 and on teetering tectonics.Australia had a lead of just …
